title: Properties of two charges in a line

content.question: Two point charges of unknown magnitudes q1 and q2 are placed as shown above. The electric field intensity is zero at point P, which is closer to q1 than to q2. Which of the following is true of the signs of the charges and their magnitudes?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
